channel.title: ShixiangWang 王诗翔
channel.description: Recent content on ShixiangWang 王诗翔

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, my name is Shixiang Wang. I&rsquo;m a PostDoc at SYSUCC. Previously, I was a Ph.D. candidate at the ShanghaiTech University (Xue-Song Liu lab). I obtained my Ph.D. degree in cell biology from CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Cell Science. I&rsquo;m a passionate R user and developer. I build web apps using Shiny, tools and packages using R, and dynamic, interactive, reproducible reports using R Markdown. Browse my list of projects for examples of my work, or review my full curriculum vitae (resume).
